8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Animal Shapes
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You transform up to ten willing creatures you can see within range into forms of your choice.

8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Antipathy/Sympathy
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: This spell attracts or repels creatures of your choice.

8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Control Weather
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You take control of the weather within five miles of you for the duration.

8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Earthquake
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You create a seismic disturbance at a point on the ground that you can see within range.

8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Feeblemind
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: You blast the mind of a creature that you can see within range, attempting to shatter its intellect and personality.

8thLevelDruidSpells.Name: Sunburst
8thLevelDruidSpells.Description: Brilliant sunlight flashes in a 60-foot radius centered on a point you choose within range.
